common_about_game1: Select the stake and then press the spin button to begin. The stake can be changed using the “Stake” button on the game interface. Maximum stake is {1 €}.
common_about_game2: Base Game Maximum Win: {200} total stake. The maximum win occurs when {5} top paying symbols (according to paytable) are adjacent in any position of the reels. Higher wins are also possible with a lower probability.
common_antebet_cost: Ante Bet used, cost: {0}, plays as round costing: {1}
common_autoSpin_title_details_1: Autoplay stopped as a single win limit of {0} was reached.
common_autoSpin_title_details_2: Autoplay stopped as a win limit of {0} was reached.
common_autoSpin_title_details_3: Autoplay stopped as a lost limit of {0} was reached.
common_error_115: Unable to fetch free game data.
common_error_details_3: Lost Connection with the Server.Please Restart Game Client.
common_error_details_4: You have an unfinished game round. Close to continue.
common_error_details_5: Connection timed out, please try again.
common_expire_details: Your session is invalid or expired. Please reopen to continue.
common_featurebuy_1: All features are played at the selected bet value when Feature Buy was activated.
common_featurebuy_2: The cost to activate is equal to {60x} total bet.
common_featurebuy_4: Only Scatter Symbols are active on Feature Buy trigger spin and no other wins are paid.
common_freeRounds_details_2: Free Rounds have finished. Normal play is resumed.
common_freeRounds_details_5: Free Rounds have been used in other games.
common_help_maxwin: Maximum win allowed in this jurisdiction is  {25000€}.
common_info_gameUi_details_1: Your current cash balance that you can use to play the game.
common_info_gameUi_details_10: Open the menu to access the Paytable, settings and other options.
common_info_gameUi_details_2:
Your total bet for current game round. 
Opens the Bet Settings menu.
common_info_gameUi_details_3: Your total win in current game round.
common_info_menuUi_details_1: Paytable: shows all possible winning combinations and payouts and contains the description of the game's features.
common_info_menuUi_details_2: Info: contains additional information about the game.
common_info_menuUi_details_4: Game History: allows you to see the replays of your most recent games.
common_info_menuUi_details_5: Close the menu and go back to the game.
common_info_menuUi_details_8: Close the game and go back to the main page.
common_info_menuUi_details_9: Toggle on for a significantly faster gameplay.
common_info_statement_details_1: Game features and settings may be subject to the terms and conditions of your service provider. Some options may also depend on geographical location.
common_info_statement_details_2: If the game is interrupted during the round, you can restart the game and watch the replay of the round. If you choose to skip the replay your balance will be adjusted immediately. In any situation where the replay functionality is insufficient, please contact the support team of your service provider.
common_info_statement_details_3: For more information about the procedure used to manage unfinished game rounds and inactivity timeouts, please refer to your service provider.
common_info_statement_details_4: In the event of malfunction of the gaming hardware/software, all affected game bets and payouts are rendered void and all affected bets are refunded.
common_info_statement_details_5: Incomplete gamerounds are automatically settled after 2 days.
common_info_statement_details_6: Winnings from automatically settled gamerounds are credited to the players account.
common_maxwin_message: YOUR WIN EXCEEDS THE MAXIMUM WIN DEFINED BY JURISDICTION,YOU WILL BE CREDITED WITH {250000} AMOUNT
common_paytable_antebet1: Selecting the Ante Bet will increase the bet level by {50%}.
common_paytable_antebet2: When the Ante Bet is active,the chance of entering Free Games is more than {300%}.
common_paytable_scatter: The Scatter symbol appears on all reels.
common_paytable_wild: Substitutes for all symbols except Scatter symbol.
common_popup_error_10: Network Connection Error. Please Try Again Later.
common_popup_error_11: Your last round was interrupted. Click Continue to continue your game.
common_popup_error_12: Your last round was interrupted. Click SKIP to collect your winnings or RESTORE to watch a replay.

common_popup_error_4: Reconnecting to the Server and Recovering Data. Please Hold.

common_popup_error_6: You have reached your selected Loss Limit for this Auto Play session.
common_popup_error_7: You are playing in Demo Mode.
common_popup_error_8: This request is blocked by the security rules.
common_popup_error_9: Network Connection Error. Please Try Again Later.

common_wincap: The maximum win amount is limited to {x30000}. If the total win from the Free Games reaches {x30000} bet, the round will immediately end and any remaining Free Games will be forfeited.
gamerules_10: You can place different regular bet types on the table.
gamerules_11: These are Inside Bets and Outside Bets.
gamerules_13: Each bet type has a maximum betting limit.
gamerules_14: To calculate your payout, divide the odds.
gamerules_16: Multiply the result by your regular bet + your regular bet = your total win.
gamerules_2: This game is based on the standard European style Roulette.
gamerules_29: * A bet on a single number.
gamerules_3: This game has numbered pockets ranging from 0 to 36 on the roulette wheel.
gamerules_30: * The chip is placed in the centre of the number.
gamerules_32: * A bet on two adjacent numbers.
gamerules_33: * The chip is placed on the line that separates the numbers.
gamerules_35: * A bet on any three numbers in a row.
gamerules_36: * The chip is placed on the outside line at the start of the row.
gamerules_38: * A bet on a block of four numbers.
gamerules_39: * The chip is placed on the spot in the centre of your four Straight Up numbers.
gamerules_4: When you start the game, the ball is dropped on to the spinning roulette wheel and it stops in a number pocket.
gamerules_41: * A bet on six numbers, comprising two adjacent rows.
gamerules_42: * The chip is placed on the line above Dozen Bets so that it rests between the two rows that you want to cover.
gamerules_45: * A bet on one of the three vertical columns.
gamerules_46: * The chip is placed at the bottom of the columns.
gamerules_48: * A bet on twelve numbers - either High, Middle or Low.
gamerules_49: * The chip is placed on one of the following areas: First 12, Second 12 or Third 12.
gamerules_5: You place a bet on the number pocket you predict the ball will stop in.
gamerules_52: * The chip is placed on one of the following squares, Even, Odd, Red, Black, 1-18 or 19-36.
gamerules_54: Use the bets track to quickly place multiple bets on the roulette table.
gamerules_56: * These are bets placed on the neighbouring numbers of a Straight Up bet.
gamerules_57: * Neighbour bets are allocated as the numbers appear on the roulette wheel and not as they appear on the roulette table.
gamerules_59: Autoplay enables you to automatically play consecutive games without interacting with the game.
gamerules_60: Autoplay plays with the last bet value you selected, so you must select a bet amount before starting Autoplay.
gamerules_61: You can choose to stop Autoplay at any time during the session.
gamerules_63: Options differ between games. Your game may not have all these options.
gamerules_64: Chip Selector: You can view more chip sizes by selecting the chip.
gamerules_65: Undo button: Cancels your last change to the bets placed on the table.
gamerules_66: Double button: Doubles the active bets on the bet board.
gamerules_70: Menu button: Displays the game settings and game paytable.
gamerules_72: Some settings and features may not be available in this game.
gamerules_73: Malfunction voids all pays and plays.
gamerules_74: Any changes to game rules will be conducted in accordance with regulatory requirements.
gamerules_75: In the event of a disconnection, the final game state is displayed on return to the game.
gamerules_76: The balance is updated with the amount won or lost.
gamerules_77: The results of the last game played are displayed.
gamerules_78: If a request does not reach the server before disconnection, the results of the previous game played are displayed.
gamerules_79: Any features in progress that require interaction or selection can be continued.
gamerules_81: The Return to Player (RTP) is the theoretical statistical percentage of the total money bet in a game that is paid out as winnings over time.
gamerules_82: The RTP is fixed, and does not change.
gamerules_83: Depending on the game you are playing, the RTP value may be defined as a single value or defined by the different stages or modes of the game.
info_10: The average theoretical return to player for Buy Bonus is {96.03%}.
